game

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the controller which includes the flow of the game.
    Author:
    Bjarke

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        The method called by the main class to begin a new game.

      • startMenu

        public void startMenu()
               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Gives the player ability to load an old game from the database, or start a new game. If new game is started the player is asked for how many playing and the names of these.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • loadGame

        private void loadGame()
               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Loads the game from the database, by the help of database class, by loading all the stored info into the new, program, created game.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • game

        public void game()
        Includes the while-loop which will keep the game going until only one player is left. Besides the while-loop it allows the user to do pick one of five options to begin his turn.

      • takeTurn

        private void takeTurn(User user)
        Checks if the user is in jail or not, and do accordingly here after if he is. If the user is not in jail, it will call playerMove, and after checks which kind of field the user landed on. Will update the GUI with balance and location of the given user. At the end of the turn the method will check whether the users balance is still positive and if he should stay in the game. Ends up with updating the GUI with balances of all players.
        Parameters:
        user - The current user whose turn it is.

      • buyHouse

        private void buyHouse(User user)
        Allows the user to pick if he wants to buy or sell his houses on his owned streets. Depending on the users option will call the method belonging.
        Parameters:
        user - The current user whose turn it is.

      • streetBid

        private void streetBid(User user)
        Will let the user pick another players own able fields to bid on. After picking the field, he will have to choose how much to bet where after the chosen player will have to accept or not. Updates both users balance and owner rights.
        Parameters:
        user - The current user whose turn it is.

      • pawnOrBuy

        private void pawnOrBuy(User user)
        Allows the user to pick if he wants to pawn or re-buy his fields. Depending on the users option will call the method belonging.
        Parameters:
        user - The current user whose turn it is.

      • pawn

        private void pawn(User user)
        Will let the user pick which own able field of his he wants to pawn.
        Parameters:
        user - The current user whose turn it is.

      • buy

        private void buy(User user)
        Will let the user pick which pawned fields of his he wants to re-buy.
        Parameters:
        user - The current user whose turn it is.

      • saveGame

        private void saveGame()
               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Saves the game with help of the database class.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • playerMove

        private void playerMove(User user)
        Rolls the dice cup and moves the user the amount of eyes show on the dices. If the user passes start he gets 4000,-.
        Parameters:
        user - The current user whose turn it is.

      • instanceOfStreet

        private void instanceOfStreet(User user)
        Checks whether or not the field the user are on is a Street. If so checks if it's owned or not. Allows the user to buy the field if not owned, else it will pay the rent to the current owner, if not the user himself.
        Parameters:
        user - The current user whose turn it is.

      • instanceOfBrewery

        private void instanceOfBrewery(User user)
        Checks whether or not the field the user are on is a Brewery. If so checks if it's owned or not. Allows the user to buy the field if not owned, else it will pay the rent to the current owner, if not the user himself.
        Parameters:
        user - The current user whose turn it is.

      • instanceOfShipping

        private void instanceOfShipping(User user)
        Checks whether or not the field the user are on is a Shipping. If so checks if it's owned or not. Allows the user to buy the field if not owned, else it will pay the rent to the current owner, if not the user himself.
        Parameters:
        user - The current user whose turn it is.

      • instanceOfTaxes

        private void instanceOfTaxes(User user)
        Checks whether or not the field the user are on is Taxes. If so it will withdraw the taxes, amount depending on which of the two taxes the user landed on.
        Parameters:
        user - The current user whose turn it is.

      • boughtField

        private void boughtField(User user,
                         java.lang.String fieldType)
        Method called if the user decides to buy the field. Will update the needed variables.
        Parameters:
        user - The current user whose turn it is.
        fieldType - Used for determine if field is a instance of shipping or brewery.

      • payRent

        private void payRent(User user)
        Method called if the user lands on a field that is owned. Will pay the correct rent, depending on houses or hotels and if all fields of the same colour are owned.
        Parameters:
        user - The current user whose turn it is.

      • getSum

        public static int getSum()
        Method used if field class needs to know the sum of the dices.
        Returns:
        The sum of the two dices in the dice cup.

      • getHouseAmount

        public static int getHouseAmount(User user)
        Counts the amount of houses a certain user owns
        Parameters:
        user - The user the game needs to know the amount of owned houses.
        Returns:
        The amount of owned houses.

      • getHotelAmount

        public static int getHotelAmount(User user)
        Counts the amount of hotels a certain user owns
        Parameters:
        user - The user the game needs to know the amount of owned hotels.
        Returns:
        The amount of owned hotels.

      • getUserList

        public static java.util.ArrayList<User> getUserList()
        Method used if another class needs to know the users.
        Returns:
        Returns the list of users.

      • getBoard

        public static Board getBoard()
        Method used if another class needs to know the board.
        Returns:
        Returns the game board.
